executable.title: BRAINSCut (BRAINS)
executable.contributor: Vince Magnotta, Hans Johnson, Greg Harris, Kent Williams, Eunyoung Regina Kim

boolean.name: multiStructureThreshold
boolean.label: multiStructureThreshold
boolean.description: multiStructureThreshold module to deal with overlaping area

boolean.name: histogramEqualization
boolean.label: histogram Equalziation Process
boolean.description: A Histogram Equalization process could be added to the creating/applying process from Subject To Atlas. Default is false, which genreate input vectors without Histogram Equalization.

boolean.name: computeSSEOn
boolean.label: Testing with testing vector input
boolean.description: compute Sum of Square Error (SSE) along the trained model until the number of iteration given in the netConfiguration file

boolean.name: createVectors
boolean.label: Create Vectors
boolean.description: create vectors for training neural net

boolean.name: validate
boolean.label: Validate
boolean.description: validate data set.Just need for the first time run ( This is for validation of xml file and not working yet )

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.

image.name: implicitOutputs
image.label: Implicit Outputs
image.description: Outputs to be made available to NiPype. Needed because not all BRAINSABC outputs have command line arguments.
